original_title: บ้านผีเปิบ
overview: At Saen Suk Village Must meet the situation When the Phi Fah who is the sacred representation of the village But when she violated the words forbidden, therefore had to become a ghost. Myself Still have to find a way to help the villagers beat the ghost again The size of the sacred person in the village like Little Xian, the gangster or will be Mae Tako Gift. Until the sky gave a group of students to travel to the village Led the team by the youngest girl Aim. The girl is afraid of Aphat, Young Talay, Jub and the young people. Special with Nut When the ghost is the Lighter, the Advanced level must be dueled with the most distorted villagers and teenagers.
tagline: The brutal story that will make you laugh until you goosebumps.
title: Bann Pee Perb
